text: "My Favourite Game" is a 1998 song by Swedish rock band The Cardigans and is the leading single from their fourth studio album Gran Turismo. It went to number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Scotland, number 3 in Sweden, number 15 in the Netherlands, number 61 in Australia, number 36 in New Zealand, number 13 in Ireland, number 12 in Iceland and number 16 on the Billboard Alternative Airplay chart. ==Formats and track listings== All songs were written by Nina Persson and Peter Svensson except "Sick & Tired", written by Magnus Sveningsson and Svensson. * UK CD1 # "My Favourite Game" – 3:39 # "War" – 3:57 # "Sick & Tired" (Live at Hultsfredsfestivalen) – 3:24 * UK CD2 # "My Favourite Game" – 3:39 # "My Favourite Game" (Wubble-U's Wubbledub Mix) – 5:58 # "Lovefool" (Live at Hultsfredsfestivalen) – 3:20 * European "Minimax" CD single # "My Favourite Game" – 3:36 # "War (First Try)" – 4:07 * Australian, Canadian, European, Japanese, and South African CD single # "My Favourite Game" – 3:36 # "War (First Try)" – 4:07 # "War" – 3:56 ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:The Cardigans songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: My Favourite Game
